name: Verdant Barrier
tooltip:
Verdant Barrier

Cost: 1200
+25 Ability Power
+25 Magic Resistance

UNIQUE Passive - Adaptive: Every 60 seconds gain 3 bonus magic resistance, stacking up to 5 times for a maximum of 15. Taking magic damage from champions reduces the time it takes to gain the magic resistance equal to 5% of damage taken in seconds.
